CADMATIC eBrowser makes project review a breeze. Walk through your 3D model, combine several models in one, or compare models with the powerful 3D viewer. You can check collisions, easily locate objects and check their details, take measurements, view laser-scanned point clouds, and leave notes (markups) on top of the 3D model. Use it with your VR interface to take project review to the next level. CADMATIC eBrowser file sizes are extremely small, only approx. 10MB per project! You can easi.y share your project 3D model via email or a messaging application like Microsoft Teams.

Why wait, download CADMATIC eBrowser now to optimize your project review and communication.

CADMATIC eBrowser  – key features:

- Stand-alone browser with support for multiple file formats: EBM, EBMX (native Cadmatic formats), DWG, DFX, IFC, DGN, NWD
- Possibility to merge and compare 3D models, including metadata and clash check, from different formats and sources and subset parts of models
- The collision detector inside eBrowser enables users to gain more in-depth insight into the 3D model, combine 3D models from different sources, and check consistency between disciplines.
- Option to upload point clouds with photorealistic panoramic views to compare design models with existing structures
- Efficient and straightforward navigation using 3D or model hierarchy, check all meta-data about any object with one click
- Control visibility, transparency, and color of objects
- Use markups for change management and discussions with other project partners
- Support for VR interface

“There is no other 3D communication tool more capable than CADMATIC eBrowser.” – Cor Lettenga, DEKC Managing Director

0.ABOUT:
A marketplace is not a single store; it’s a collection of stores. A marketplace is not a single store; it’s a collection of stores. Customers walk in and can browse goods from several different vendors. Customers buy the products on the marketplace and the owner gets a commission from every sale the vendors make. Owners do not have to find products to sell and vendors do not have the cost to build and maintain a website. Vendors can focus on supplying quality products and owners canilding a brand, investing in marketing.

Multivendor sites offer customers the kind of experience that would need a large company to run. It would need warehouses, buyers and distribution amongst other big overheads. A fairly small operation can run an e-commerce store with thousands of lines of inventory, the product range offered may be fairly wide-ranging, or it enables more niche products to be offered together under a single brand. The product range can be curated to offer a pre-selected range to the visitor or can be open-access, allowing anyone to list their products.

Contrariamente ad altri strumenti Low-Code e No-Code, che obbligano l'utente a partire dal disegno del workflow e del processo, eLegere si concentra sulle esigenze di operatività sul dato, permettendo di disegnare e configurare un'applicazione in modo flessibile.
Disponibile sia on-cloud che on-premise, è conforme a tutti gli standard enterprise di IT, audit e sicurezza. 
La piattaforma è stata adottata con successo da istituzioni e aziende leader di molteplici settori.

ePayco vende es la solución diseñada para todas aquellas personas que desean ir un paso más allá en sus ventas físicas e iniciar la venta de productos por internet, logrando una mayor cobertura y ampliando el alcance del negocio, creando catálogos personalizados con categorías y productos ahorrando tiempo, costos, con pasarela incluida que le permite procesar sus pagos desde el primer momento de creación y publicación del catálogo, seguridad de punta a punta y creación en simpleo 1: Selección del Plan 
 

 En ePayco vende manejamos planes desde cero pesos y los planes pagos oscilan desde $19.900 pesos COL , accediendo a nuestro panel administrativo solo iniciando sesión o si aún no tiene cuenta puede registrase en nuestro sitio web epayco.com en pocos minutos, sin cuotas de mantenimiento o cuota de instalación, darse de alta le permitirá visualizar en el panel izquierdo la solución vende junto al icono del carrito, seleccionar uno de los planes: gratis, plus o ultra, donde sus funcionalidades varían desde las más básicas hasta la más completa herramienta. ¡Acceda ahora mismo sin costo! 
 

 Paso 2: Configuración del catálogo 
 

 La configuración del catálogo se realiza en tres acciones:
 

 • Identidad del catálogo: desde donde podrá definir información importante de su empresa y marca como: nombre, teléfono para contacto a través de whatsapp, subdominio del sitio, y aspectos de personalización como: logo de la empresa, definir un color destacado el cual predominará sobre botones, textos, márgenes entré otros ítems de interacción y cargar hasta tres imágenes tipo banner.
 

 • Creación de categorías: Esta acción le permite facilitar la búsqueda de los productos a los compradores, por eso recomendamos realizar categorías intuitivas y sencillas que permitan la fácil navegación del cliente en el sitio web. 
 

 • Agregue los productos: Por último, Incluya todos los productos definiéndoles un catálogo y categoría, podrá describir el producto de manera detallada, cargar hasta cinco imágenes de los diferentes ángulos del producto, adicionalmente al valor neto podrá realizarle descuentos e incluirle impuestos y por último definir el inventario disponible de productos.

ePayco Suscripciones es la solución que permite el crecimiento de los negocios automatizando cobros, con el respaldo de una plataforma diseñada para garantizar y ofrecer una experiencia renovada en los cobros. Brinda comodidad en el proceso de pago para los clientes, permitiendo realizar cobros y recibir pagos a tiempo, sistematizados y mejorando la retención e ingresos recurrentes de su comercio. ePayco Suscripciones cuenta con alternativas para brindar soluciones rápidas ysus clientes, reduciendo tiempos en el proceso de pago y evitando recordar vencimientos de fechas o recordatorios innecesarios que ya se realizan de manera automática. Con esta solución puede centralizar los pagos y mantenerlos organizados, para generar los cobros automáticos y almacenando los datos de los medios de pago puede controlar y estar al tanto de los movimientos realizados.
 

 ePayco Suscripciones integra soluciones como:
 Tokenización: Le permite almacenar de forma segura los datos de los medios de pago, con la finalidad de agilizar y mejorar la experiencia para usuarios que realizan pagos de forma recurrente, con ventajas como:
 

 • Facilitar y reducir tiempo en el proceso de pago, generando confianza y cercanía con su cliente.
 • La información privada del cliente está almacenada con los más altos estándares de seguridad.
 • Logra destacarse por la experiencia y el servicio ofrecido entre sus competidores.
 

 Recurrencias: Está diseñado para clientes que hacen uso de membresías, planes mensuales, servicios o facturas y para comercios que desean brindar comodidad a su comprador a la hora de realizar el cobro automático de sus productos/servicios, efectuando las deducciones desde el medio de pago permitido por el cliente, ajustadas al periodo solicitado y aceptado por el mismo para generar ese cobro de forma diaria, mensual o anual.
 

 Domiciliación: Ofrece al comercio la opción de conectar dos soluciones de ePayco entre sí, y con domiciliación se puede relacionar facturas y métodos de pago para generar cobros automáticos, así como, generar reglas de cobro para sus facturas e incluir cobros periódicos con montos variables.

Agatha Clinical is an electronic master file (eTMF) application that connects all trial participants and processes in a single, cloud-based application. Leveraging the TMF Reference Model, Agatha Clinical includes standard templates to help you get up and running quickly, reducing ramp-up time to hours and days instead of weeks or months. With configurable actions that allow you to capture processes in end-to-end workflows, Agatha Clinical provides a tool to enforce best practices, document a.l activities, and connect all study participants. The result is faster start-up, more consistent processes, and complete trial documentation ready for inspection at any time.

Benefits

- Inspection Ready

Your Trial Master File is up-to-date at all times and ready for
sponsors, CROs, sites, and most importantly, auditors and
inspectors.

- Fully Automated & Efficient

Document creation, review, and approvals are fully automated to ensure efficient and effective execution of all trial activities.

- Connected to Everyone

Every authorized trial participant — sponsors, CROs, and sites — can connect to the eTMF without the need for cumbersome IT processes.

Fully Compliant

- Agatha Clinical is built around the industry-standard eTMF reference model and ensures that every document expected in the file is present.

Features

- Create and Manage Sites & Documents
- Create and manage trial sites based on the TMF Framework. Combine documents and forms to accelerate study processes.
- Access Workspaces and Tasks in the Dashboard
- View all your workspaces for each clinical trial site in the dashboard and quickly see and access tasks assigned to you.
Use the configurable views to inspect, verify, and identify gaps in the expected eTMF contract at any time.
Agatha Clinical (eTMF)


Advanced Forms

- Work with ready-to-use standard forms and processes, or adapt them to support your needs. Forms include rich text fields that allow the addition of images and formatted text. Use the form designer to update the look and feel of your forms.

- A single multi-part form supports all steps in a process. Reviews, approvals, and assignments for actions are also built-in.

- Author and Edit Documents Directly in the App
- Co-Author and edit Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files directly in the application, without the need for a Microsoft Office license. Annotate PDF, Office documents, and images with a simultaneous review of documents.
- Ensure Quality Checks Are Completed
- Designate documents for the quality check process and track the quality review using custom views.
Complete Metrics and Reporting
- Get all the reporting you need with built-in dashboards and reports, and export reports for external reporting requirements. You can also create views and reports across workspaces and export results to Excel for dashboard reports.

Plus:

- Extended Template Sets
- Collect feedback from sites with Post Market Surveys and collect consent documents with Informed Consent.
- Advanced Policy And Access Management
- Manage policies, associated roles, and access controls easily.
- Advanced Integration Toolkit
- Use Agatha’s Rest API to allow applications to upload or export items from Agatha (includes documentation & sample code).

Secure Cloud

Agatha Applications are cloud-based, hosted in Agatha’s highly secure, highly reliant, high-performance, compliant, cloud environment.

Three Editions:

Standard, Extended, and Premium
Some features are only available in Extended or Premium editions.

4.ABOUT:
Corporate security relies greatly on User Access Management. A US FDA 483 Observation for Pharmaceutical and Biotech Companies may be issued in GMP environments if illegal access authorization is granted to application software and instrument software. The number of automated applications continues to increase in the Life Sciences Industry. Among these various software packages are ERP, LIMS, LMS, QMS, DMS, eBMR, eLogs, and Chromeleon, to mention just a few. Several Cloud solutions ilable to them along with on-premise ones. It is not uncommon for major corporations to have between 100 and 200 software applications.

It’s difficult to keep track of users, access permissions, role updates, license utilization, and compliance. Many leading pharmaceutical and biotech firms still use paper-based requests for access management. In the present-day manual procedures, unsafe access-related issues including duplicate identities, illegal access, limited or no validation of pre-requisites for access provisioning, absence of audit trails for access assignments, and other difficulties lead to major vulnerabilities. Identity and access management for users cannot be centrally managed.

Assuring regulatory compliance and ensuring a smooth audit process can be made easier by providing a reliable system that can oversee, maintain, and manage user access permissions for the workforce, as well as track management authorizations for exceptions.

According to data, more than 40% of user access rights are still in place after an account has been terminated. Inability to revoke access puts the firm open to attack (especially for SAAS applications) and makes it difficult to effectively employ User Licenses.

AmpleLogic User Access Management Software, commonly known as identity and access management (IAM), is built in LOW-CODE NO-CODE (LCNC) PLATFORM. It aids in the provisioning and management of users’ access to internal and external apps, as well as third-party SAAS permissions, based on their function and designation.

Using this software, IT managers can ensure that their employees have safe and secure access to the organization’s services and facilities. A Universal Directory allows this to happen.

User Access and Permission Management Software ensures that your organization’s security regulations are followed. It is linked to the Active Directory. AmpleLogic Identity and Access Management Software integrates seamlessly with SAP, HRMS, and Active Directory or LDAP.

Edu720 also offers a variety of features to track employee progress and measure the ROI of training programs. Here are some of the key features of Edu720: Short, engaging videos: Edu720 videos are typically 5-10 minutes long and cover a specific topic or skill. Theyd to be engaging and informative, so that employees can stay focused and learn effectively.

Interactive tests: Edu720 tests allow employees to assess their understanding of the material they have learned. The tests are interactive and engaging, so that employees can stay engaged and motivated to learn.

Track employee progress: Edu720 tracks employee progress through the training program. This information can be used to identify employees who are struggling and provide them with additional support.

Measure ROI of training programs: Edu720 can be used to measure the ROI of training programs. This information can be used to justify the cost of training and to make improvements to future training programs.

Edu720 is a good choice for businesses that want to provide their employees with short, engaging, and effective training. It is also a good choice for businesses that want to track employee progress and measure the ROI of training programs.

Despite the tremendous potential of social media, businesses struggle to manage their social media presence effectively. Many businesses lack the resources to provide 24/7 customer support on social media, which can result in missed opportunities and a poor customer experience. Managing multiple social media platforms can also be a time-consuming and challenging task, particularly for small businesses and individuals. In addition, businesses often struggle to generate leads from sochich can limit their growth and revenue potential. These challenges can result in missed opportunities and limit the effectiveness of social media as a marketing tool for businesses.

CoxPost's platform addresses these challenges by providing a comprehensive solution that streamlines social media management and enhances the customer experience.

CoxPost is an all-in-one social media marketing platform powered by AI. It offers a range of features to enhance your social media presence, automate tasks, and drive engagement. Here are the key components of CoxPost:

AI-Powered Social Media Chatbot: CoxPost's chatbot allows you to automate customer interactions and provide instant responses to queries on your social media platforms. The chatbot utilizes natural language processing (NLP) algorithms to understand user messages and deliver relevant and personalized responses.

Social Media Post Scheduler: With CoxPost, you can schedule your social media posts in advance. It supports major social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn. You can plan your content calendar, create posts, and schedule them to be published at the optimal times for maximum reach and engagement.

AI-Powered Social Media Comment Automation: CoxPost leverages AI algorithms to automatically generate and post comments on social media platforms. This feature helps you engage with your audience, increase interactions, and save time by automating repetitive tasks.

eCommerce in Social Media Chats: CoxPost provides built-in eCommerce functionality within social media chats. You can showcase products, provide descriptions, and enable secure transactions directly through the chat interface. This seamless integration allows you to drive sales and provide a convenient shopping experience for your customers.

Lead Generation from Social Media Chats: CoxPost helps you capture leads from social media chats by integrating lead generation forms within the chatbot. You can collect contact information, preferences, and other relevant data to nurture leads and convert them into customers.

Email Marketing: CoxPost includes email marketing capabilities, allowing you to design and send personalized email campaigns to your subscribers. You can segment your audience, create visually appealing emails, and track campaign performance using analytics. Integration with lead generation forms enables automated email sequences for nurturing leads.

SMS Marketing: CoxPost also offers SMS marketing features, allowing you to send targeted SMS campaigns directly to your customers' phones. You can send promotional offers, updates, and important notifications to drive engagement and boost conversions.

CoxPost aims to streamline your social media marketing efforts, automate repetitive tasks, and leverage AI-powered features to enhance customer interactions and drive business growth.

17.ABOUT:
Meeting Room Schedule is a software solution for managing meetings rooms on door displays. It runs on wall mounted Android Tablets next to the door of your meeting room. You can easily book rooms from the tablet for walk-in meetings or for events in the future. It provides you an overview of all available rooms, giving status information about free meeting time slots. It integrates resource calendars like Office3365, MS Exchange or Google Workspace (formerly GSuite). No additional to for PC bookings from Outlook or Google Calendar. Work like you did before and get more features at the door display. Waiting for your meeting to start and wondering who will be joining? Check the acceptance status of the participants. 

If you’re managing your rooms with paper, you’ll be surprised about how much time this solution is going to save. Think of all the work for each change. Instead you can update the display with a few klicks and changes are shown in real-time. Your administrative staff can focus on the essentials and you’ll save tons of paper.  

The catering team can access information about the event and knows what needs to be prepared. It also helps your visitors to find the right room and displays the overview schedule for a larger event.  
Typical time-wasters are double bookings or other reservation conflicts due to poor organization or lack of transparency in occupancy plans. Door displays avoid these problems by displaying real-time updated room occupancy, booking processes directly on the display or even the automatic cancellation of a booking in case of non-use, which leads to a significantly better utilization of the rooms. 
We as Schedule Display offer solutions for Android-based tablets. We propose preferring professional displays over consumer devices or e-ink based solutions. We are convinced that an interactive, color touch display with good resolution offers the best functionality for room reservations. The customer has the highest long term flexibility because this choice gives the biggest variety of software vendors and customer-driven extensions in functionality can be implemented very quickly. Before making a decision, the solution can be piloted very easily with a consumer tablet. Different types of end users can be involved in the selection process.  

The most common display sizes for door signs are 7 inch or 10 inch, larger displays such as 12 inch or in large format are becoming increasingly popular. Large displays are considered to be the right choice for bigger halls and for displays showing the overview of all rooms. If the corridors are long, users face the following problem: The room availability is only visible after many steps, when they have reached the display. Here, professional displays with external side LEDs for status indication (green/red) offer good visibility from the distance. 
If you prefer a tablet or display solution with power supply, there are various options. Power can usually be provided from above/below/behind, depending on the individual situation and availability of power or Ethernet (PoE). There are a variety of mounting and cable routing concepts. Depending on the number of rooms, whether it’s a new construction or room upgrade, the customers’ budget, installation skills of the IT department or building services and specifications of the procurement strategy, the answer may be different.

 TechForce won the ARN Innovation Award 2019. More than 60 partners and start-ups made the final shortlist after receiving over 400 award submissions to the most competitive and comprehensive selection of leading innovators across Australia. ARN honours the leading talents and players across the IT industry, recognising the achievements of an outstanding contingent of partners, start-ups, vendors, distributors and individuals.
  
 Australian Business Awards Regional Finalist – 2019
 

 TechForce was the proud Regional Finalist of the Australian Business Awards in 2019. This award is an annual all-encompassing awards programme, which recognises organisations that demonstrate the core values of business innovation, employee engagement, customer satisfaction, experience management, business sustainability, product and technology innovation through a set of comprehensive award categories.
  
 Fast 100 Starters – 2020
 

 TechForce was named among the Fast 100 Starters in 2020. To be a Fast Starter, the age of the business is considered. It should have started trading after July 2015 and should have achieved more than $500,000 turnover during the FY 2018-2019, supplying at least two years’ worth of full revenue data. 
 

 Best Workplaces in Australia – 2021
 

 TechForce was ranked among the Best Workplaces in Australia in 2021. It was ranked on parameters such as Purpose, Flexibility, Well Being, Equality, Empowerment, Learning, Democracy, Choice, Challenge, and Belonging. TechForce scored well on all these parameters to be ranked among the Best Workplaces in Australia in 2021.

 INDUSTRY RECOGNITIONS:
 

 ACS Trustmark Recognition
  
 TechForce has the ACS Trustmark recognition. The ACS Trust Mark Scheme is unique and designed on a foundation of international best practice principles, suited for companies in Australia. It demonstrates an organisation’s ability in one of seven registered scopes: Managed Services, Cloud, Cyber Security, Infrastructure, Apps, Websites, and Mobility. The ACS Trust Mark provides confidence to purchasers in the capability of their technology partners.
 

 ISO 9001:2015 Recognition: 
 

 TechForce is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company. It is a quality certification given for Quality Management System to an organisation. This certification demonstrates an organisation’s ability to consistently provide products and services that meets customer needs and requisite statutory and regulatory requirements. It also implies that the organisation aims to enhance customer satisfaction through effective application of the system, including processes, for improvement of the system and conformance to customer and requisite statutory and regulatory requirements.
